mapper.update: update sys_dictionary set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_key = #{dictKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, modify_time, version, status, name, dict_key, value, remark, order_no, parent_id, path from sys_dictionary where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, create_time, modify_time, version, status, name, dict_key, value, remark, order_no, parent_id, path from sys_dictionary
